title: A Suffragette in Spite of Himself

sources.title: A Suffragette in Spite of Himself

metadata.Plot: How a thoroughly respectable British householder, bitterly opposed to woman's suffrage, becomes apparently a violent advocate of the cause, the difficulties this gets him into finally leading to his arrest, his forcible rescue by a band of suffragettes who believe him their champion, his final arrival home in a torn and dilapidated condition before his astonished wife and, above all, how the fatal "votes for women" confronts him at the end. All these make the fun fast and furious.
metadata.Actors: Marc McDermott, Miriam Nesbitt, Ethel Browning
